channel.title: why the lucky stiff
channel.description: hex-editing reality to give us infinite grenades!!

item.dc:subject: quatrains
quatrains
item.dc:creator: why the lucky stiff
item.description:
That cadillac of yours and that driver of yours!
You and your teacups rattling away in the back seat!
You always took the mike, oh, and all those cowboys you shot!
I held your hand! And I’ll shoot a cowboy one day!

You said, “Let’s run into the woods like kids!”
You said, “Let’s rub our hands together super-hot!”
And we scalded the trees and left octagons, I think that was you and
You threw parties on the roof!
